Items API

账目的增、删、改、查

获取账目信息

GET /api/v1/items

Parameters

Name Description
start_date 起始日期，秒数
end_date 结束日期，秒数
page 页数
sort 日期排序, ASC: 小 -> 大， DESC: 大 -> 小

Response Fields

Name Description
items[id] id
items[name] 账目名称
items[note] 账目备注
items[category] 类型，可能的值有："expenses"、"income"
items[amount] 金额（分）
items[user_id] 创建用户id
items[tag_id] 标签id
items[date] 账目日期
items[updated_at] 更新时间
items[created_at] 创建时间
pagination[total_pages] 总页数
pagination[current_page] 当前页数
pagination[prev_page] 上一页的页数
pagination[next_page] 下一页的页数
pagination[first_page] 是否第一页
pagination[last_page] 是否最后一页

Request

Headers

Version: HTTP/1.0
Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJ1c2VyX2lkIjozMzAsImV4cCI6MTY2MzMxMjIwMn0.mwi6DFf1dtDR4IhbAt2QVZ7Uu27DNkF8zCIB_51tgpQ
Accept: application/json
Content-Type: application/json
Host: example.org
Cookie:

Route

GET /api/v1/items?start_date=1662621002&end_date=1662793802&page=1

Query Parameters

start_date: 1662621002
end_date: 1662793802
page: 1

Response

Headers

X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN
X-XSS-Protection: 0
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Download-Options: noopen
X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none
Referrer-Policy: strict-origin-when-cross-origin
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Vary: Accept, Accept-Encoding, Origin
ETag: W/"4693642751e523049087349aef694a0f"
Cache-Control: max-age=0, private, must-revalidate
X-Request-Id: f708a283-f407-40ee-b352-92fe9ee6d44f
X-Runtime: 0.010941
Content-Length: 2380

Status

200 OK
